spec_data.Name: pdfmod
spec_data.Description:
You can reorder, rotate, and remove pages, export images from a document,
edit the title, subject, author, and keywords, and combine documents via
drag and drop.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sat 05 Aug 2017 12:10:35 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: A simple application for modifying PDF documents
